TopicTitle: Hello from a gobsmacked and sleep-deprived new KSP addict

Articles.Content:
Hi

Had to register here just to say a BIG thank you to the devs of Kerbal Space Program!

I saw Apollo 11 land when I was 9, and I was hooked on space then.

I remember thinking 'gee, by the time I'm 30 I'll be able to go into space, too'...

ho, hum...

... but now, thanks to Squad, I can be a kerbonaut!

Welcome pendant! I understand the sleep deprivation all too well.

I was also hooked on space by watching the Apollo 11 landing when I was a kid. These forums host a very helpful and generally friendly community.

Good to have you aboard.

Happy landings!
Hi, welcome! Check out many of the excellent Tutorials in the Tutorials Sub-Forum, also any of the amazing Videos available in Live from Mission Control.
